vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.1.10;
son of: Ladan (H3936);
father of: Elishama (H0476)
§ Ammihud = "my kinsman is majesty"
1) an Ephraimite, father of Elishama, the chief of the tribe at the time of the exodus
2) a Simeonite, father of Shemuel
3) father of Pedahel, prince of the tribe of Naphtali
4) father of king Talmai of Geshur
5) a descendant of Judah through his son Pharez
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Ladán; ancestro de Josué; tribu de Efraín; (b)   hombre; tribu de Simeón; (c)   padre de Pedahel, jefe; tribu de Neftalí; (d)   padre del rey de Guesur; (e)   hombre; tribu de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞米忽 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "我的親屬是尊貴的"
1) 以法蓮人, 出埃及時為該支派首領以利沙瑪的父親
2) 西緬人, 示母利的父親(民 34:20)
3) 拿弗他利支派首領比大黑的父親(民 34:28)
4) 基述王達買的父親(撒下 13:37)
5) 猶大兒子法勒斯的子孫(代上 9:4)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚米忽 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "我的亲属是尊贵的"
1) 以法莲人, 出埃及时为该支派首领以利沙玛的父亲
2) 西缅人, 示母利的父亲(民 34:20)
3) 拿弗他利支派首领比大黑的父亲(民 34:28)
4) 基述王达买的父亲(撒下 13:37)
5) 犹大儿子法勒斯的子孙(代上 9:4)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.34.20;
father of: Shemuel (H8050H)
§ Ammihud = "my kinsman is majesty"
1) an Ephraimite, father of Elishama, the chief of the tribe at the time of the exodus
2) a Simeonite, father of Shemuel
3) father of Pedahel, prince of the tribe of Naphtali
4) father of king Talmai of Geshur
5) a descendant of Judah through his son Pharez

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.13.37;
father of: Talmai (H8526H)
Also named: am.mi.chur (עַמִּיחוּר "Ammihur" H5991)
§ Ammihud = "my kinsman is majesty"
1) an Ephraimite, father of Elishama, the chief of the tribe at the time of the exodus
2) a Simeonite, father of Shemuel
3) father of Pedahel, prince of the tribe of Naphtali
4) father of king Talmai of Geshur
5) a descendant of Judah through his son Pharez

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.4;
son of: Omri (H6018I);
father of: Uthai (H5793)
§ Ammihud = "my kinsman is majesty"
1) an Ephraimite, father of Elishama, the chief of the tribe at the time of the exodus
2) a Simeonite, father of Shemuel
3) father of Pedahel, prince of the tribe of Naphtali
4) father of king Talmai of Geshur
5) a descendant of Judah through his son Pharez
